thread.section_title: Legend Hotel by Elegancia - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Exceeded expectations!
thread.title_full: Exceeded expectations! - Review of Legend Hotel by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ramneet_1995
title: Exceeded expectations!
text: Lovely hotel - great location, lovely staff (especially receptionist with long black hair.. sorry I didn't catch your name) & she accommodated for any requests we had (help with metro, spare adapter, ironing board, reservation in a restaurant, pre booked our taxi for the airport) - the hotel was super clean & we got complimentary teas/coffees/hot chocolates during our stay. We got the street view room (as requested) which was lovely as it gave a lovely Parisian feel to the room! Overall it was truly a great stay for me & my mum & won't hesitate to come back or recommend to a friend.
